pkgmetadata.longdescription: Helper Functions for Structural Equation Modeling // An assortment of helper functions for doing structural equation modeling, mainly by 'lavaan' for now. Most of them are time- saving functions for common tasks in doing structural equation modeling and reading the output. This package is not for functions that implement advanced statistical procedures. It is a light-weight package for simple functions that do simple tasks conveniently, with as few dependencies as possible.
